image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot inside a modern, clean industrial warehouse in Sydney. In the foreground, a diverse group of warehouse workers and a maintenance manager are conducting a safety briefing. They are wearing high-visibility vests (orange and yellow), hard hats, and safety glasses. One worker is holding a tablet (showing the back of the device only) gesturing toward a yellow forklift. The background shows high-bay racking and other industrial equipment. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing safety and compliance. No text or words in the image.
